long_description:
Are you traveling to San Francisco this summer? We would love to host you at our historic Nob Hill hotel! 

Traveling to San Francisco this summer to see the Golden Gate Bridge, visit the Ferry Building Farmers Market, and walk along Fisherman’s Wharf? Stanford Court Hotel has great rates, friendly staff, and comfortable accommodations to ensure you have a great stay. Whether you are traveling for work or pleasure, we have everything you need to have an amazing stay.

 

Why is San Francisco so great during the summer?

San Francisco is the place to be during the summer because of the great weather, festivals, and activities. There is always something going on and the city is alive.

 

What are the San Francisco main attractions?

The main attraction in San Francisco is the city itself. Walking around your senses will be amazed at the architecture, culture, colors, food, and noises. We are partial to Nob Hill, but we also love exploring the Ferry Building, Union Square, Golden Gate Bridge, especially on our Stanford Court bikes! Book our Bike the Bridge package here!

 

Are there any deals or promotions?

Yes! We are always offering specials on our website! You can see our packages, such as the Bed and Breakfast package, Parking Package, Bike the Bridge package, and more. Stay tuned because we will be offering some great new packages soon! We also have great group rates! Contact our Sales Department for more information.

 

How can I learn more about Stanford Court?

We are flattered you want to learn more about our Nob Hill hotel! You can read more posts on our blog, get social with us on Instagram, Facebook and Twitter (we always have great promotions there), and you can also explore our website.

  

It would be GR8 2 CU in San Francisco this summer!

 

-Stan @StanfordCourtSF
